roadmapItems.title: Release 1.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Initial release with key features for finance and HR modules.

children.title: Finance Module
children.description: Introducing the finance module with essential features and fixes.

children.title: Resolved issues with ledger balancing.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting the balancing of ledgers.

children.title: Fixed errors in financial report generation.
children.description: Corrected errors encountered during financial report generation.

children.title: Added support for multi-currency transactions.
children.description: Introduced support for transactions in multiple currencies.

children.title: Improved budgeting and forecasting tools.
children.description: Enhanced tools for better budgeting and financial forecasting.

children.title: HR Module
children.description: Introducing the HR module with new tools and bug fixes.

children.title: Fixed bugs in employee record management.
children.description: Resolved issues in managing employee records.

children.title: Resolved issues with payroll calculations.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting payroll calculations.

children.title: Introduced advanced performance evaluation tools.
children.description: Added tools for evaluating employee performance.

children.title: Added self-service portal for employees.
children.description: Introduced a portal for employees to manage their own information.

roadmapItems.title: Release 1.3.0
roadmapItems.description: Enhancements to supply chain management and customer relationship management.

children.title: Supply Chain Management (SCM)
children.description: Enhancing the SCM module with new features and fixes.

children.title: Corrected issues with inventory tracking.
children.description: Resolved problems with tracking inventory.

children.title: Resolved bugs in order fulfillment process.
children.description: Fixed issues affecting order fulfillment.

children.title: Added support for real-time inventory updates.
children.description: Introduced real-time updates for inventory management.

children.title: Implemented advanced supplier management tools.
children.description: Added tools for managing suppliers more effectively.

children.title: Customer Relationship Management (CRM)
children.description: Enhancing the CRM module with new features and fixes.

children.title: Fixed errors in customer data synchronization.
children.description: Resolved issues with synchronizing customer data.

children.title: Resolved issues with contact management.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting contact management.

children.title: Introduced automated lead scoring.
children.description: Added automated lead scoring to prioritize leads.

children.title: Added support for multi-channel customer interactions.
children.description: Introduced support for interacting with customers across multiple channels.

roadmapItems.title: Release 2.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Major update with advanced analytics and enhanced security.

children.title: Advanced Analytics
children.description: Introducing advanced analytics for better insights.

children.title: Corrected data discrepancies in reports.
children.description: Fixed issues causing discrepancies in analytics reports.

children.title: Fixed bugs in dashboard widgets.
children.description: Resolved issues with widgets on the analytics dashboard.

children.title: Added predictive analytics for sales forecasting.
children.description: Introduced predictive analytics to forecast sales.

children.title: Improved data visualization options.
children.description: Enhanced options for visualizing data in reports.

children.title: Enhanced Security
children.description: Implementing new security features to protect user data.

children.title: Resolved vulnerabilities in user authentication.
children.description: Fixed security vulnerabilities in the authentication process.

children.title: Fixed issues with data encryption.
children.description: Resolved problems with data encryption methods.

children.title: Implemented role-based access control.
children.description: Added support for controlling access based on user roles.

children.title: Added multi-factor authentication support.
children.description: Introduced multi-factor authentication for enhanced security.

children.title: Mobile Optimization
children.description: Optimizing the application for better mobile use.

children.title: Corrected layout issues on mobile devices.
children.description: Fixed layout problems affecting mobile users.

children.title: Improved mobile interface for all modules.
children.description: Enhanced the mobile interface across all application modules.

children.title: Added mobile-specific features for quick access.
children.description: Introduced features for quick access on mobile devices.

roadmapItems.title: Release 2.4.0
roadmapItems.description: Focused on enhancing the finance and HR modules.

children.title: Finance Module Enhancements
children.description: Introducing new features and fixes to the finance module.

children.title: Resolved issues with tax calculation.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting the calculation of taxes.

children.title: Fixed bugs in expense tracking.
children.description: Resolved issues with tracking expenses.

children.title: Introduced automated reconciliation.
children.description: Added features for automatic reconciliation of accounts.

children.title: Added support for new financial regulations.
children.description: Introduced support for compliance with new financial regulations.

children.title: HR Module Enhancements
children.description: Enhancing the HR module with new features and fixes.

children.title: Fixed errors in leave management system.
children.description: Resolved issues affecting the leave management system.

children.title: Resolved issues with benefits administration.
children.description: Fixed problems in administering employee benefits.

children.title: Added support for remote workforce management.
children.description: Introduced features for managing a remote workforce.

children.title: Improved employee onboarding process.
children.description: Enhanced the process for onboarding new employees.

roadmapItems.title: Release 3.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Major update with supply chain optimization and CRM enhancements.

children.title: Supply Chain Optimization
children.description: Enhancing the supply chain module with AI-driven tools.

children.title: Corrected issues with shipment tracking.
children.description: Resolved problems affecting the tracking of shipments.

children.title: Fixed bugs in demand forecasting.
children.description: Fixed issues with forecasting demand in the supply chain.

children.title: Implemented AI-driven supply chain optimization.
children.description: Added AI tools to optimize the supply chain process.

children.title: Added advanced logistics management tools.
children.description: Introduced tools for better management of logistics.

children.title: CRM Module Enhancements
children.description: Introducing new features and improvements to the CRM module.

children.title: Resolved issues with CRM integrations.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting integrations with the CRM module.

children.title: Fixed errors in customer segmentation.
children.description: Resolved issues with segmenting customers in the CRM.

children.title: Introduced customer journey mapping.
children.description: Added tools for mapping the customer journey.

children.title: Improved CRM analytics and reporting.
children.description: Enhanced analytics and reporting features in the CRM module.

children.title: User Experience Improvements
children.description: Enhancing the overall user experience with new features and fixes.

children.title: Resolved interface inconsistencies.
children.description: Fixed inconsistencies in the user interface design.

children.title: Fixed navigation issues.
children.description: Resolved problems affecting navigation within the application.

children.title: Improved overall user interface design.
children.description: Enhanced the design of the user interface for better usability.

children.title: Added customizable dashboards for different user roles.
children.description: Introduced customizable dashboards tailored to different user roles.

roadmapItems.title: Release 3.3.0
roadmapItems.description: Focused on advanced reporting and integration hub enhancements.

children.title: Advanced Reporting
children.description: Introducing advanced reporting features and fixes.

children.title: Corrected issues with report scheduling.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting the scheduling of reports.

children.title: Fixed bugs in custom report generation.
children.description: Resolved issues encountered during custom report generation.

children.title: Added support for cross-module reporting.
children.description: Introduced features for reporting across multiple modules.

children.title: Introduced advanced filtering and sorting options.
children.description: Added advanced options for filtering and sorting report data.

children.title: Integration Hub
children.description: Enhancing the integration hub with new features and fixes.

children.title: Resolved issues with third-party integrations.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting third-party integrations.

children.title: Added support for new API integrations.
children.description: Introduced support for integrating new APIs.

children.title: Implemented seamless integration with popular business applications.
children.description: Added features for seamless integration with various business applications.
